entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
